features: Little Twig Conditioner: Get silky and smooth hair by adding Little Twig hair conditioner to your hair care routine that can work as a rinse-out or leave-in conditioner. Great for all hair types, the conditioner will easily tame even the wildest curls

Extra Mild Formula: Made with organic ingredients like aloe vera, chamomile, calendula, vitamins E & B5, white tea leaf extract, essential oils, and natural botanicals - our hair conditioner will revitalize and beautify your hair in no time!

Nourishing and Moisturizing Conditioner: With a unique and specifically-created formula, the hair conditioner will moisturize, nourish, hydrate, and protect your delicate hair while leaving them soft, shiny, bouncy, and tangle-free

Free from Harsh Chemicals: Our natural conditioner is free from parabens, sulfates (SLS, SLES, SCS), artificial fragrance, dyes, gluten, silicones, and phthalates, making it a perfect choice for the whole family

Made in the USA: We are committed to providing natural and effective hair care for the whole family. That's why our conditioner is pH-balanced, pediatrician-recommended, organic, cruelty-free, and vegan, ensuring the proper safety of you and your kids
body.description: Add smoothness and enhance the beauty of your hair with Little Twig hair conditioner, made with a blend of organic ingredients like aloe vera, chamomile, calendula, vitamins E & B5, white tea leaf extract, essential oils, and natural botanicals. Suitable for all hair types, our hair conditioner can work as a hair detangler and moisturizer. Our hair conditioner nourishes your hair and makes them look shinier and cleaner. Free from parabens, sulfates (SLS, SLES, SCS), artificial fragrances, dyes, gluten, silicones, and phthalates, the natural hair conditioner is an ideal choice for the whole family. With its fragrance-free formula, you can enjoy the goodness of this conditioner without any added scent. Also, our conditioner is pH-balanced, pediatrician-recommended, organic, cruelty-free, and vegan, ensuring the proper safety of you and your kids. Grab your conditioner today and switch to a natural and effective hair conditioner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curly head baby hair loved it!
reviews.reviewText: I loved the smell and how silky my daughter's curls were once her hair dried. This works for all ethnicities.If your little one has the type of curly hair on the thicker side that gets dry and matted up easily, then you should use this more as a leave in conditioner with a spritz of water and then twist/braid the hair till dry.But other than that, it works well with all hair types as a good baby conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for hypoallergenic reasons to have good ingredients and no scent. Pretty good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, soft manageable hair, no scent
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner makes your hair super soft no strong fragrance smell or cause itching. I use this due to eczema and it has worked great for me. Wished it came in a bigger bottle. It is expensive and I do go through it quickly, so I will be looking for a different brand. Sadly can’t afford this long term.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best detangler ever!
reviews.reviewText: I've been searching high and low for a natural alternative, and I finally found the very best leave-in conditioner for my 3yr old. Her hair reaches the small of her back and she can't stand to have her hair brushed, much less after washing it when it's tangled. This conditioner makes her hair so slick, the tangles just slip through the brush. I use essential oils daily for my own homemade products, and the lavendar in this conditioner smells like genuine lavendar. I have very long, coarse, curly hair and I've been a WEN girl for years, but I'm using this now. My hair so soft and smells so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Conditioner, But Not Hypoallergenic
reviews.reviewText: It contains lavender. Yes, a flower (with pollen) that a lot of people are allergic to. So, for being mislabeled, this product gets one less star. That being said, it is darned good conditioner, and only makes my scalp itch a little bit (which is more than I can say for 99% of all conditioners out there).My hair is hopelessly, un-manageably curly. Not "just wash it once a week and you'll be fine" curly; it's "it starts turning into dread locks if I don't use conditioner for two days" curly. Oh, and while it's turning into dread locks, what isn't knotting together is frizzing out into a white 'fro. It just isn't the look I'm going for. So, I tried this conditioner, and it does two amazing things:1. It de-tangles my hair, so I don't have to spend an hour in front of a mirror trying to get the knots out. (It now takes about 10 minutes.)2. It weighs down my hair so that instead of turning into ringlets + frizz, it becomes mostly ringlets, which I like.My hair still gets unmanageable after two days or so, but for those two days, but getting it manageable, again, is far less of a chore, and it looks better between washings than it used to. With a slightly itchy scalp (grrrr).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my kids because of the natural ingredients and detangling feature and ended up buying it for myself as well. I’ve used lots of conditioner from Loreal to expensive pureology but this conditioner has been the best. It really detangles! I can easily brush my long hair. I don’t recommend applying this on your scalp because it can make your hair flat. Apply it from the chin down only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If your like me, you are scrolling through fragrance free healthy options for a conditioner that are affordable. Stop right here. I’m 37 and I’m starting my toxic free journey of skin care and health. I didn’t even realize this was made for infants as well but to my surprise the first night I used it it was fantastic. I never knew conditioner could make your hair feel so light weight. I was so used to using junk all my life my hair felt weighted down and HEAVY! I will never go back. I love this conditioner. My hair has never felt so soft and so light. And to my surprise it gave me a ton of volume. For the first time in over 15 years I feel like I have my natural hair back! So happy!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly unscented, and excellent results.
reviews.reviewText: A pure, completely scent-free product that has been consistent in quality and pricing. It has no chemical scent/masking additives either. So convenient to comb through wet hair and leave in ~ cost effective, too, as you’re not rinsing most of it down the drain. And the pump is convenient also ~ no having to shake the bottle and pour. Hair is soft, without static, and looks natural; it doesn’t leave a shiny, artificial film. Love this product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Just what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: This smells great, you only need the tiniest amount (seriously, the smallest dollop will go a long way!) which means it will last us a long long time and which makes it so worth the money you pay. Works both ways rinse off or leave in without weighing the hair down or making it greasy.Bought it to tame and condition my little girls crazy curls and it works so well for her hair. Thumbs up.
Lots of leakage of conditioner inside packaging
When i first applied this conditioner it made my daughter's 4C hair soft and easy to comb. I also use it as a leave in conditioner. I will get the shampoo too. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: and though it's not exactly what I expected we're very happy with it
reviews.reviewText: We switched to this from a natural conditioner, and though it's not exactly what I expected we're very happy with it. It is free of major allergens like wheat/gluten, nuts, and soy - which is very hard to find. It has a nice mild scent. It does well to detangle, and I've seen an improvement in split-ends & breakage in both of my daughter's hair that are using it. The awesome surprise is that we can use this as a leave-in or wash it out. It works great both ways! I thought that was great, because often leave-in conditioner gives your hair a dirty look and strange coated feel. I would have given it 5-stars if it was actually a natural conditioner. Alas, they've just added some essential oils and called it "natural". If you're looking for a truly natural personal care product to avoid ingredients like lauryls & benzotes then this may not be the one for you. The conditioner rates a 3 on EWG when I looked it up. That being said I would buy it again, because it's one of the best balanced options I've seen out there.
Makes my daughters hair very soft and smooth.. and I only need to use a pea sized amount so this bottle will last quite a while and it smells so good! Very satisfied!
